Text: This is a single file Word Document. No virus here. The only virus is the first comment
Jesus even forgives liars like the first comment from pecavi
O Ni blinda, öppna ögonen för f*N, "mänskligheten använder religion för att försvara sig, om man går ut i krig!! då är man den "goda" " !  töntar

for everyone that thinks Christianity is stupid or that God does not exist you must know that there is a heaven and there is a hell and God the father sent his only Son to die for our sins and you need to know that he raised from the dead and conquered death hell and the grave and can offer you salvation from hell if you just accept him into your heart. His name is Jesus and he loves you with an unconditional love and if you want saving just pray this prayer 

Lord Jesus i accept you into my heart and thank you for taking my sins with you on the cross when you died and saved me from an eternity in hell when you rose from the dead. I ask that you help me grow as a follower of Christ in Jesus' name
